title: Janet Yellen Confirmation Hearing for Treasury Secretary Set for Jan. 19
sub_head: Senate Finance Panel to consider the former Fed chairwoman’s nomination to lead U.S. Treasury
body:
BREAKING NEWS...
The Senate Homeland Security Committee announced that it would hold a hearing on Jan. 19 for Alejandro Mayorkas to serve as the head of the Department of Homeland Security.
(More to Come)
Previously reported
WASHINGTON—The Senate Finance Committee is set to hold a hearing on Janet Yellen’s nomination to be Treasury secretary on Jan. 19, the day before President-elect Joe Biden is inaugurated, according to a Senate aide.
